events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will start reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation based on your software development skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to assist you throughout the process.
Your initial screening has been completed successfully; the recruiter was impressed with your experience and will reach out to schedule interviews.
Thank you for responding promptly to our scheduling request. We appreciate your enthusiasm and cooperation in this interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare for coding and system design questions.
You completed the technical interview, showing strong skills in software engineering and problem solving. The panel was very impressed.
The HR interview has been scheduled for April 25th at 2 PM UTC to discuss your cultural fit and career aspirations with the company.
You successfully completed the HR interview and demonstrated excellent alignment with the companyâ€™s values and vision for engineers.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role. Details of the compensation package and benefits have been included.
Thank you for providing your feedback on the offer. We are glad to hear you appreciate the terms and are excited about the opportunity.
You have accepted the offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you aboard as part of our engineering team. Next steps will begin shortly.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive documents and access credentials to get you set up for your first day.
The hiring process is now closed with your successful integration into the engineering team. We welcome you and look forward to your contributions.
